ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Chimer
ModMetaData.author: ESCP
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in a playable Chimer race using Humanoid Alien Race Framework. Led by the prophet Veloth, tribes of dissident Aldmer sought a new life, in a new land. The Chimer closely resemble the Altmer, though their skin is comparatively darker, and their stature is closer to that of the Dunmer.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires Harmony
-Requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
